overview:
Stuart is an experienced corporate financier who specialises in advising tech businesses on fund raising, disposals, acquisitions and licensing.

In 2003, Stuart founded Ascendant - boutique corporate finance house which works with tech, media, cleantech and life science businesses. He studied engineering before taking an MBA at Manchester Business School. Since graduation he has been consistently involved in corporate finance either as a client or in an advisory capacity. Prior to Ascendant worked for Hill Samuel, Nomura, Regent Associates and Cobalt Corporate Finance. Stuart has worked with businesses from start up right through to final exit.

His clients have included, Spark Energy, ACAL Energy, ClusterSeven, Trampoline Systems, Skinkers, Focus Solutions plc, Edenbrook, Screen Pages, Staffcare, AIM Technology, Sun Microsystems, Vicorp, Terahertz Photonics, Mergermarket, Systems Union and Xaar plc
